00029 #ifndef __OverlayElementFactory_H__
00030 #define __OverlayElementFactory_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreOverlayElement.h"
00034 #include "OgrePanelOverlayElement.h"
00035 #include "OgreBorderPanelOverlayElement.h"
00036 #include "OgreTextAreaOverlayElement.h"
00037 
00038 namespace Ogre {
00039 
00052     class _OgreExport OverlayElementFactory : public OverlayAlloc
00053     {
00054     public:
00056         virtual ~OverlayElementFactory () {}
00058         virtual OverlayElement* createOverlayElement(const String& instanceName) = 0;
00060         virtual void destroyOverlayElement(OverlayElement* pElement) { delete pElement; };
00062         virtual const String& getTypeName(void) const = 0;
00063     };
00064 
00065 
00067     class _OgreExport PanelOverlayElementFactory: public OverlayElementFactory
00068     {
00069     public:
00071         OverlayElement* createOverlayElement(const String& instanceName)
00072         {
00073             return OGRE_NEW PanelOverlayElement(instanceName);
00074         }
00076         const String& getTypeName(void) const
00077         {
00078             static String name = "Panel";
00079             return name;
00080         }
00081     };
00082 
00084     class _OgreExport BorderPanelOverlayElementFactory: public OverlayElementFactory
00085     {
00086     public:
00088         OverlayElement* createOverlayElement(const String& instanceName)
00089         {
00090             return OGRE_NEW BorderPanelOverlayElement(instanceName);
00091         }
00093         const String& getTypeName(void) const
00094         {
00095             static String name = "BorderPanel";
00096             return name;
00097         }
00098     };
00099 
00101     class _OgreExport TextAreaOverlayElementFactory: public OverlayElementFactory
00102     {
00103     public:
00105         OverlayElement* createOverlayElement(const String& instanceName)
00106         {
00107             return OGRE_NEW TextAreaOverlayElement(instanceName);
00108         }
00110         const String& getTypeName(void) const
00111         {
00112             static String name = "TextArea";
00113             return name;
00114         }
00115     };
